page.title: 05Taxis, Airport, Buses:Kirkby
page.content: {Taxis: }There are about 4 taxi ranks in Kirkby: at the Town Centre, the Johnny Todd public house, Broad Lane and at Kirkby station. {Airport: }Liverpool Airport is at Speke. It is an International Airport. As the crow flies it is about 11 miles from Kirkby. {Buses: }Here is a list of some of the important bus routes serving Kirkby: 152 goes to Northwood and Kirkby Station; 155 and 157 come from the Pier Head in Liverpool and go round Kirkby; 92 comes from the Pier Head, passes through Kirkby and goes to Prescot; 151 goes from Kirkby Administrative Centre to Tower Hill; 156 serves Walton and Tower Hill; 90 serves St. Helens; 369 visits Skelmersdale. So you can see that Kirkby is well served by transportation routes.
